Container.Name: PreviewMaid
Container.Overview: Preview maid is a tool to help you find missing thumbnail previews in your plex library. By default it will run on a schedule at 00:00. Optionally you can have it run once and output before exiting.

Config.Name: PLEX_URL
Config.Description: The URL to your Plex instance

Config.Name: FIND_MISSING_THUMBNAIL_PREVIEWS
Config.Description: Set to true to find missing thumbnail previews.

Config.Name: FIND_MISSING_VOICE_ACTIVITY
Config.Description: Set to true to find missing voice activity analysis data.

Config.Name: RUN_ONCE
Config.Description: Set to true if you wish for only on run after which the container will terminate.

Config.Name: RUN_TIME
Config.Description: The daily time to run the job in the format HH:MM.

Config.Name: SKIP_LIBRARY_TYPES
Config.Description: A comma separated list of library types to skip. Options are tv,movie,photo

Config.Name: SKIP_LIBRARY_NAMES
Config.Description: A comma separated list of library names to skip

Config.Name: DEBUG
Config.Description: Set to true if you wish to enable debug logging.
